column4: hi all - any advice on uninstalling Gnome (like should I do it?). I've got XFCE up and running and can't see me using Gnome again (although keeping some of the gnome apps would be nice)
i'm a bit tight on space. Surely if I leave GTK installed the Gnome apps wills till be able to run?
yes, if you have the libraries it's ok
the same thing with kde & gnome, you can use kde apps in gnome when you have the kde libraries
